channel.title: Kirsty Duncan
channel.description: Recent news about Kirsty Duncan, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Busy day in our #Etobicoke riding office-focused on helping people find #jobs & #food 2day. We need a national breakfast program #cddnpoli

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: "Let freedom ring". Fifty years later, what does Dr Martin Luther King 's speech, "I Have a Dream", mean to you? #cdnpoli #Etobicoke

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Up bright & early, & looking forward to another good day of summer caucus in beautiful #PEI! #cdnpoli

item.description: Thank you to @scott_baptist & @psitivechangeTO for your profoundly important work!

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Thank you #Etobicoke North for coming out 2 our community BBQ! We hope you had as much fun as we loved serving you! #TOpoli #onpoli

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Thanks 2 @PanoramaIndia 4 a wonderful celebration of #India Independence Day @ Dundas Square in #Toronto! Amazing entertainment! #cdnpoli

item.title: Mentioned by iPolitics.ca (subscription)
item.description:
It's Ramadan: Former Minister Toews, did you get the job done?
By Kirsty Duncan, M.P. | Jul 16, 2013 8:57 pm | iPolitics Subscription Required | Comments. Ramadan, one of the .... Safety and Emergency Preparedness? Kirsty Duncan is a Liberal member of parliament (Etobicoke North) and critic for the Environment.
